execution_plan.description: Find chats where every member has at least one message: compute per-chat member count and keep only chats where the number of distinct senders (among members) equals the member count.
execution_plan.query: SELECT chat_members.chat_id AS s1__chat_id, COUNT(chat_members.user_id) AS s1__member_count FROM chat_members LEFT JOIN messages ON chat_members.user_id = messages.sended_by AND chat_members.chat_id = messages.chat_id GROUP BY chat_members.chat_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT messages.sended_by) = COUNT(chat_members.user_id);

execution_plan.description: Return chat id and name for chats that passed the previous step (i.e., every member has sent at least one message).
execution_plan.query: SELECT chats.id AS s2__id, chats.name AS s2__name FROM chats WHERE chats.id IN ($step1.s1__chat_id);
